title: Sales Forecasting MLOps Platform
summary: Production-grade forecasting pipeline orchestrated with Airflow, tracked with MLflow, and containerized for repeatable training & inference.
highlights: Automated validation → feature engineering → training → tracking → artifacts
Ensemble forecasting with Optuna tuning; tracked metrics + diagnostics in MLflow
Containerized services for reproducible runs and easy local deployment

title: SQL-RAG (LLM-powered SQL Query)
summary: Streamlit app that turns natural language into SQL using a local LLM + RAG over schema metadata, with live execution on SQLite.
highlights: Schema-aware retrieval to improve accuracy on complex joins
Automated table creation, inserts, and real-time query execution
Designed as a reusable service pattern for analytics teams

title: Stream Forge (Real-time Data Streaming)
summary: End-to-end streaming pipeline: API → Kafka → PostgreSQL → Spark transforms → Cassandra, plus AWS S3 → Glue → Athena flow.
highlights: Built streaming ingestion with Kafka and batch/stream processing with Spark
Persisted to operational + analytical stores (Postgres/Cassandra)
Implemented AWS Glue crawlers + Spark ETL to Parquet for Athena analytics

title: Social Pulse (Social Media Analysis System)
summary: API extraction + storage + NLP/topic modeling to assess social presence across YouTube, Reddit, X, and Tumblr.
highlights: Automated API ingestion jobs with Airflow
Stored raw + processed data in MongoDB for flexible exploration
Generated company profile insights via NLP + topic modeling

title: Job Market Analysis
summary: NLP + ML analysis on 100,000+ job descriptions to identify skill demand, role clusters, and salary trends.
highlights: Extracted top in-demand skills using text mining
Clustered roles into 5 groups based on qualifications and experience
Built interactive dashboards to visualize salary trends and skill pairs

title: Lend Lens (Bank Loan Analytics)
summary: SQL + Tableau analytics dashboard covering loan applications, funded amounts, interest rates, and DTI metrics.
highlights: Created interactive report for key loan KPIs and drill-downs
Visualized monthly trends, regional patterns, loan purpose, and ownership
Designed stakeholder-friendly metrics and views for decisioning

title: Eye-Move (Assistive Eye-Typing System)
summary: CNN-based gaze tracking + NLP prediction to enable on-screen typing for motor-impaired users; deployed on AWS.
highlights: Built gaze tracking model using CNNs for accessible text input
Improved typing efficiency with n-gram prediction to reduce keystrokes
Integrated smart-home controls to demonstrate real-world ML impact
